Description: 
--------------------- 
The first time you play a Steel Storm will seem a classic shoot'em up, but after a few seconds of the game you will notice that goes further. 

Storm Steel ingredients are of good quality: labyrinthine scenarios, hordes of enemies willing to kill you, armament changed to not run out of ammo ... Everything you need to spend hours and hours. 

Managing Storm Steel is made from mouse. The stage will move with it, using your robot as a fixed reference point. To shoot just have to use the left and right button, each assigned to a type of shot. 

Steel Storm has two game modes, classic arcade and multiplayer version with dedicated servers and a scenario editor to create your own levels.
